bibl.title: Augustamnica in the Athanasian Festal Letter Index.
bibl.note: Augustamnica was separated AD 341. The correct reading of the text here has far-reaching implications for the ecclesiastical side of the administrative structure in Egypt.
bibl.seg: Riall Robert A., Augustamnica in the Athanasian Festal Letter Index.
Augustamnica was separated AD 341. The correct reading of the text here has far-reaching implications for the ecclesiastical side of the administrative structure in Egypt.
